comments.body: why do we have so many exports here?

Check failed with "SC2034: image_field1 appears unused. Verify use (or export if used externally)."
All of them are used externally and I think export them should be the case we need.

They are used in some other files under `test/cmd/`.
``` base
# grep "image_field1" -rn test/cmd/*
test/cmd/apps.sh:78:  kube::test::wait_object_assert daemonset "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_DAEMONSET_R2_2}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:84:  kube::test::get_object_assert daemonset "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_DAEMONSET_R2_2}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:98:  kube::test::wait_object_assert daemonset "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_DAEMONSET_R2_2}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:339:  kube::test::get_object_assert deployment "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_PERL}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:343:  kube::test::get_object_assert deployment "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_PERL}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:349:  kube::test::get_object_assert deployment "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_PERL}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:353:  kube::test::get_object_assert deployment "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_PERL}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:357:  kube::test::get_object_assert deployment "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_PERL}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:361:  kube::test::get_object_assert deployment "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_DEPLOYMENT_R1}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:365:  kube::test::get_object_assert deployment "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_DEPLOYMENT_R1}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:430:  kube::test::wait_object_assert statefulset "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_PAUSE_V2}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:436:  kube::test::get_object_assert statefulset "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_PAUSE_V2}:"
test/cmd/apps.sh:450:  kube::test::wait_object_assert statefulset "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_PAUSE_V2}:"
test/cmd/core.sh:1267:  kube::test::get_object_assert deployment "{{range.items}}{{${image_field1:?}}}:{{end}}" "${IMAGE_PERL}:"
```
If it make more sense that I will add one comments above these declares to explain why we need to export them.

thanks!

sorry I'm so behind reviewing this

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +366,370 @@  export container_len="(len .spec.template.spec.containers)"
  export image_field0="(index .spec.template.spec.containers 0).image"
  export image_field1="(index .spec.template.spec.containers 1).image"

  # Make sure "default" namespace exists.

comments.body:
No, actually it's used in current file.
And because of this it's okay to not export it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +66,70 @@PROXY_HOST=127.0.0.1 # kubectl only serves on localhost.

IMAGE_NGINX="k8s.gcr.io/nginx:1.7.9"
export IMAGE_DEPLOYMENT_R1="k8s.gcr.io/nginx:test-cmd"  # deployment-revision1.yaml
export IMAGE_DEPLOYMENT_R2="$IMAGE_NGINX"  # deployment-revision2.yaml
